hero.title: Transform Cybersecurity Documentation into Armenian
hero.subtitle: Bridge the language gap in Armenian cybersecurity education. Help translate open-source security documentation, submit GitHub PRs, earn certificates, and build a stronger security community in Armenia.

quickAccess.access: Access our collection of Armenian cybersecurity documentation, translated and reviewed by security experts. All translations are available for free.

github.title: GitHub PR Integration
github.description: Direct integration with cybersecurity projects. Submit translations as pull requests and get them merged

review.title: Security Expert Review
review.description: Community-driven security validation with cybersecurity expert reviews and feedback

certificates.title: Earn Security Certificates
certificates.description: Get verified certificates for cybersecurity translation contributions after GitHub PR merges

step1.title: Choose a CyberSec Project
step1.description: Browse available cybersecurity projects and select documentation that needs translation

step2.title: Translate & Submit PR
step2.description: Use our editor to translate content and submit pull requests to GitHub repositories

step3.title: Earn Security Certificates
step3.description: Receive certificates after your PRs are merged and build your cybersecurity reputation

community.title: Join Our Community
community.subtitle: Building Armenia's Tech Future
community.description: Every translation you contribute helps make technology more accessible to Armenian speakers. Join a growing community of developers, translators, and tech enthusiasts working together to bridge the language gap in technology education.

owasp.title: OWASP Top 10 Guide
owasp.description: Critical web application security risks translated to Armenian

nmap.title: Nmap Network Scanning
nmap.description: Comprehensive network discovery and security auditing guide

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to continue your cybersecurity translation journey

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Join the Armenian cybersecurity translation community

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
forgotPassword.success: Password reset link sent to your email

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.userNotFound: No account found with this email
errors.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.continueContributing: Continue contributing to Armenian cybersecurity education

mobile.title: Dashboard Not Available on Mobile
mobile.description: The translation dashboard includes complex project management and detailed analytics that work best on desktop devices.

stats.translationReviewed: Your translation is being reviewed by moderators. You cannot edit until the review is complete.
stats.translationAccepted: Your translation has been accepted and published. Great work!

achievementUnlockedMessage.title: Ultimate Achievement Unlocked!
achievementUnlockedMessage.description: You've reached the highest level of contribution. You are a true pioneer of Armenian cybersecurity education!

recentCertificates.title: Recent Certificates
recentCertificates.completeProjects: Complete translation projects to earn certificates

Dashboard.needsRevisionDescription: Your translation was reviewed and needs changes. Please make revisions and resubmit.
Dashboard.createAccountDescription: Create an account and start translating to collect achievements.

Projects.title: Cybersecurity Projects
Projects.subtitle: Choose a project to start translating cybersecurity documentation into Armenian
Projects.noProjectsDescription: Get started by creating some example projects to test the translation system.
Projects.createExampleDescription: This will create sample cybersecurity projects with documentation files for translation.
Projects.loginRequired: Please log in to create example projects.
Projects.noProjectsFoundDescription: No cybersecurity projects match your current filter.

projectCard.viewProjectSource: View project source code on GitHub
projectCard.startTranslatingProject: Start translating this project to Armenian
projectCard.projectFullyTranslated: This project has been fully translated

mobile.title: Project Browser Not Available on Mobile
mobile.description: Project browsing and file assignment require desktop tools for detailed project analysis and translation workflow management.

ProjectDetail.createExampleDescription: This will create sample projects and files for testing the translation system.
ProjectDetail.noFilesDescription: This project doesn't have any documentation files yet.
ProjectDetail.useRepositorySync: Use the Repository Sync below to import documents from GitHub.

ProjectDetail.previewFileContent: Preview file content before starting translation
ProjectDetail.selectFileToTake: Please select a file to take it for translation
ProjectDetail.selectFileHint: Click on a file in the browser above to select it for preview or translation.
ProjectDetail.reviewInProgress: Your translation is being reviewed by moderators. You cannot edit until the review is complete.

documentSelection.title: Select Document to Translate
documentSelection.description: Choose which documentation file you'd like to translate to Armenian

documentPreview.title: Documentation Preview
documentPreview.description: This is the original documentation that needs to be translated into Armenian.
documentPreview.securityNote: Cybersecurity terminology requires consistent translation to maintain accuracy.

submitModal.title: Submit for Review
submitModal.reviewProcess: Your translation will be reviewed by cybersecurity experts

Translations.title: Armenian Cybersecurity Translations
Translations.subtitle: Access professionally translated cybersecurity documentation in Armenian. All translations have been reviewed and approved by security experts.

Certificates.title: Your Certificates
Certificates.subtitle: View and verify your cybersecurity translation certificates

verify.title: Verify Certificate
verify.description: Enter the verification code from your certificate to verify its authenticity. Only public information is shown for privacy protection.

noCertificates.title: No certificates yet
noCertificates.description: Start translating cybersecurity documentation to earn your first certificate!

howToEarn.title: How to Earn
steps: Get your PR merged by maintainers

verification.title: Verification
features: Each certificate has a unique code

Docs.title: Armenian Documentation Library
Docs.subtitle: Browse all available translations across {count} projects
Docs.noDocumentsDescription: Our community is actively translating cybersecurity documentation into Armenian. Join us to help build this valuable resource, or seed some sample data for testing.
Docs.communityDescription: Help make cybersecurity knowledge accessible to Armenian speakers. Every translation strengthens our community's digital literacy and security awareness.
Docs.translateDescription: Convert security documentation into professional Armenian translations
Docs.collaborateDescription: Work with security experts and native speakers for quality assurance
Docs.secureDescription: Contribute to Armenia's cybersecurity knowledge and digital safety

DocDetails.ctaDescription: Found this translation helpful? Join our community of translators and security experts to help make more resources available in Armenian.

mobile.title: Moderation Tools Not Available on Mobile
mobile.description: Content moderation and review tools require detailed interfaces and precise controls that work best on desktop environments.
